content: WEBSITE  WHITEPAPER TWITTER FACEBOOK TELEGRAM INSTAGRAM YOUTUBE  Bounty Related All questions: Group Here Channel HerePlease Submit your Report only end day of the week (Only Saturday/Sunday Forum time); Otherwise you will get no stakes. Create a new post to submit your Report.Bounty detailsTheBitGold is starting its Official Bounty Program in order to reward its supporters with BGT tokens.1,000,000 BGT tokens will be allocated to the Bounty Pool. ¬†The Bounty campaign will last for 6 week. Payment will be made weekly by the TeamWeek 1 (29 Aug - 04 Sep)..........EndWeek 2 (05 Sep - 11 Sep)..........EndWeek 3 (12 Sep - 18 Sep)..........EndWeek 4 (19 Sep - 25 Sep)..........EndWeek 5 (26 Sep - 02 Oct)..........EndWeek 6 (03 Oct - 09 Oct)..........ENDYou can buy/sell NFT by BGT token. Only for registered users. Join here (telegram) &  HERE to get updatesBounty reward will be Divided below sections, üåç Section A: Twitter campaign (25%)üåç Section B: Facebook Campaign (15%)üåç Section C: Instagram Campaign (15%)üåç Section D: Video Campaign (20%)üåç Section E: Blog/Article Campaign (15%)üåç Section F: Telegram Campaign (10%)Mandatory Rules‚ñ†If you Submit your work report without applying, your stakes will not count;‚ñ†Must join our Telegram group;‚ñ†Must join  Bounty telegram group;‚ñ†Must follow us on Twitter;‚ñ†Do not use multiple Accounts and Do not use a Neg trust account;‚ñ†Newbies are welcome for all campaigns;‚ñ†Do not request to change wallet address without hacked issue;‚ñ†We reserve the right to remove you from our campaign without explaining why we removed you;‚ñ†The team can decide anything to increase/decrease rewards depending on the participants,‚ñ†Each Week will end Sunday at 23:59 (Forum Time)All campaign Application Form‚ñ†Post a reply before join campaign‚ñ†Code:[b]#Proof_of_Authentication_PostBitcointalk username: Telegram username: Which campaign you joined: BSC wallet address: [/b]Twitter Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Facebook Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Instagram Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Video Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Blog/Article Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Telegam Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Rules of Twitter Campaign:‚ñ†Follow our official Twitter page;‚ñ†Minimum 1000 followers need to join this campaign;‚ñ†Your profile must be public, Otherwise, you will be removed;‚ñ†Must Retweet & likes 5 posts every week from our official page;‚ñ†Make 2 posts every week with "https://buy.thebitgold.com/ #bitgold #thebitgold #BGT #BEP20 #BSC;‚ñ†Your Twitter account must be old 3 months;‚ñ†TwitterAudit score of at least 70% will be accepted.#1000-5000 Followers: 5 Stakes per week;#5001-10000 Followers: 10 Stakes per week;#10000+ Followers: 20 Stakes per week;Rules of Facebook Campaign:‚ñ†Follow our official Facebook page;‚ñ†Minimum 1000 followers need to join this campaign;‚ñ†Your profile must be public, Otherwise, you will be removed;‚ñ†Must Share, likes, Comment 5 posts every week from our official page;‚ñ†Make 2 posts every week with "https://buy.thebitgold.com/ #bitgold #thebitgold #BGT #BEP20 #BSC;‚ñ†Your Facebook account must be old 3 months;#1000-5000 Followers: 5 Stakes per week;#5001-10000 Followers: 10 Stakes per week;#10000+ Followers: 20 Stakes per week;Rules of Instagram Campaign:‚ñ†Follow our official Instagram page;‚ñ†Minimum 1000 followers need to join this campaign;‚ñ†Your profile must be public, Otherwise, you will be removed;‚ñ†Must Share & likes 5 posts every week from our official page;‚ñ†Make 2 posts every week with "https://buy.thebitgold.com/ #bitgold #thebitgold #BGT #BEP20 #BSC;‚ñ†Your Instagram account must be old 3 months;#1000-5000 Followers: 5 Stakes per week;#5001-10000 Followers: 10 Stakes per week;#10000+ Followers: 20 Stakes per week;Rules of Video:‚ñ†Minimum 500 Subscribers need to join our campaign‚ñ†Subscriber must be public;‚ñ†Video minimum length 2 minutes;‚ñ†You must have at least 100 views before being accepted;‚ñ†Your title must include the word The Bit Gold. And Use hashtag #bitgold #thebitgold #BGT #BEP20 #BSC;‚ñ†Video quality will be good;‚ñ†You can use any language & Be sure it will noise-free. Bot/Robotic Voice not allowed;‚ñ†In the video Description must add Our Website, Bitcointalk thread, Twitter link, Facebook Link, Instagram Link, and also Telegram link;‚ñ†Maximum 4 videos will accept for one person;‚ñ†You will add your Bitcointalk username and Profile link in Video DescriptionYoutube Video Rewards#Good Quality: 1 Stakes;#Better Quality: 2 Stakes;#Best Quality: 3 StakesSubscriber- 500-5000 (Extra 1 stakes)5001-10000 (Extra 2 stakes)10000+ (Extra 3 stakes)Rules of Article:‚ñ†Content Must be original;‚ñ†Your blog will be Crypto related. Telegraph, Blogspot, and WordPress (free blog) will not accept;‚ñ†The article must be up to 500 words;‚ñ†We don‚Äôt allow websites with no audience or new websites; the website you choose to publish your text on must be at least 2 months old and must have user activity. ‚ñ†Content must be in English‚ñ†Maximum 4 content will accept for one person;‚ñ†Must add Our Website, Bitcointalk thread, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram link into your content;‚ñ†Must add your Bitcointalk username and Profile link in your content;Content Rewards#Good Quality: 1 Stakes;#Better Quality: 2 Stakes;#Best Quality: 3 StakesRules of Telegram Campaign:‚ñ†Must join our Telegram group If you not join our group you will get 0 stakes;‚ñ†Add our AVATAR and name ( "Your Name | The Bit Gold Ambassador" ) -Get extra 2 stakes;‚ñ†Positive message in The Bit Gold Group 2 times every week;‚ñ†Post minimum 5 positive messages about The Bit Gold and other Crypto Telegram group;‚ñ†Do not spam into telegram group;‚ñ†Do not use slag language into telegram group;‚ñ†Submit your message link End of week (Saturday/Sunday Forum time)Campaign Spreadsheet/Master Spreadsheet (Participants List)[N.B- Token distribution will be done by the team and Distribution will be done every week. I am bounty manager for this project. I have the right to change any rules of this project.]

comments.body: UPDATE 1- 30 August 2022‚ñ†Maximum 4 videos will accept for one person;‚ñ†Maximum 4 content will accept for one person;UPDATE 2- 02 September 2022‚ñ†Please Submit your Report only end day of the week (Only Saturday/Sunday Forum time);UPDATE 3- 29 September 2022‚ñ† Hello bounty hunters, You Can Buy/Sell NFT by $BGT Token. Details here- https://t.me/qqwx_bounty/15333 ;UPDATE 4- 7 October 2022‚ñ† A good news for missing stakes (Only Weeks 3,4,5, Don't claim weeks 1,2). You can claim once. Just quote your old report (which you submitted other days, not Saturday/Sunday) Only on 8/9 October (Saturday/Sunday).UPDATE 20 October 2022‚ñ† Bounty Payment sent to hunters wallet.
